front.title: Recommendation to avoid use of BGP Extended Communities at Internet Exchange Route Servers

abstract.t: This document outlines a recommendation to the Internet operational community to reject BGP routes to which BGP Extended Communities are attached. It includes guidance for both IP networks and Internet Exchange Points (IXPs). This approach helps ensure the global Internet routing system performance and helps protect Route Server stakeholders against against misconfigurations.
